title: install issue with numba
body:
<!--
The issue tracker is a tool to address bugs in GraSPy itself. If you'd like to report a bug in GraSPy, fill out the template below and provide any extra information that may be useful / related to your problem.
-->

## Expected Behavior
install graspy

## Actual Behavior
process exited
(from what I can tell it's an issue related to `hyppo`s numba dependency)

## Template Code
```
pip3 install graspy

```

## Full Traceback
```

    File "/tmp/pip-build-ogxz66p6/llvmlite/ffi/build.py", line 105, in main_posix
      out = subprocess.check_output([llvm_config, '--version'])
```
